params.allocation: The percentage of tips allocated to this stream
params.lockedUntilEpoch: The epoch until which this tip stream is locked
params.recipient: The address of the tip stream recipient

params.accessManager: The address of the access manager contract
params.treasuryAddress_: The address of the treasury to receive remaining funds

returns._0: allStreams An array of TipStream structs containing all tip stream information

params.recipient: The address of the tip stream recipient

returns._0: TipStream struct containing the tip stream information

returns.total: The total allocation as a Percentage

params.recipient: The address of the tip stream recipient to remove

params.newTreasuryAddress: The new address for the treasury

params.fleetCommander_: The address of the FleetCommander contract to distribute tips from

params.fleetCommanders: An array of FleetCommander contract addresses to distribute tips from

params.newAllocation: The new percentage allocation for the tip stream
params.newLockedUntilEpoch: The new epoch until which this tip stream is locked
params.recipient: The address of the tip stream recipient to update

getAllTipStreams().notice: Retrieves information about all tip streams

getTipStream(address).notice: Retrieves information about a specific tip stream

getTotalAllocation().notice: Calculates the total allocation percentage across all tip streams

shake(address).notice: Distributes accumulated tips from a single FleetCommander

shakeMultiple(address[]).notice: Distributes accumulated tips from multiple FleetCommanders
